description: Unemployment numbers, aid in Nepal, and Ben Bernanke joins PIMCO.
teaser: Unemployment numbers, aid in Nepal, and Ben Bernanke joins PIMCO.
contentencoded: The number of people signing up for unemployment benefits hit a 15 year low in the last week. More on that. Plus, more on the efforts to get aid to Nepal with AmeriCares CEO Michael Nyenhuis. And former Fed Chairman Ben Bernanke is joining PIMCO as an advisor. We look at what this means.
title: PODCAST: Bernanke joins PIMCO
